Key Match Events: Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game
Brooks Lee snapped an 0-for-19 stretch with a go-ahead, two-run double
Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam
Nolan Schanuel had his 13th homer of the season
Jordyn Adams added his first career homer
Post-Match Reflections: Minnesota has back-to-back wins after losing six of its previous seven games
The Twins remain six games behind Cleveland and 1 1/2 behind Kansas City in the AL Central
They are three ahead of Detroit for the final AL wild-card spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Royce Lewis' drive to left field was initially called a home run but a review showed that the ball hit off the top of the wall and back into play for a two-run double
Jack Kochanowicz (2-5) allowed four runs in 5 2/3 innings for the Angels
Nolan Schanuel had his 13th homer of the season among three hits
Jordyn Adams added his first career homer for Los Angeles
